Function Documentation

int add_blacklist_entry ( long long int  number,
char *  name,
char *  reason,
int  priority 
)

Add a number to the blacklist. The number will be blocked after that.

Parameters:
number The telephone number of the person.
name The name of the person.
reason Why you have blocked this person.
priority Has no affect at the moment. Later one it will be possible to give each number priority. So you have more control when a number will be blocked/accepted.
Returns:
If all goes well 0 (zero) otherwise an errno code.

int add_whitelist_entry ( long long int  number,
char *  name,
char *  reason,
int  priority 
)

Add a number to the whitelist. The number will be accepted after that.

Parameters:
number The telephone number of the person.
name The name of the person.
reason Why you have blocked this person.
priority Has no affect at the moment. Later one it will be possible to give each number priority. So you have more control when a number will be blocked/accepted.
Returns:
If all goes well 0 (zero) otherwise an errno code.
